item.title: Gazans Are Dying of Starvation
item.description: After 21 months of devastating conflict with Israel, Gaza’s most vulnerable civilians — the young, the old and the sick — are facing what aid groups s...

item.title: South Korea Jockeys for a Deal With Trump at Least as Good as Japan’s
item.description: The agreement that Japan secured has added pressure on South Korea to defuse the threat of high tariffs on its exports to the United States.

item.title: Thailand Says 12 Killed in Border Clashes With Cambodia

item.title: A Series of Mysterious Explosions Unnerves Syrians

item.title: Ancient Temples Have Long Been a Flashpoint Between Cambodia and Thailand
item.description: Both countries lay claim to centuries-old worship sites perched on the mountains that divide the two nations, sometimes stoking nationalistic fervor.
